description: GroupResources represents resource kinds in an API group.

group.description: Group is the name of the API group that contains the resources. The empty string represents the core API group.

resourceNames.description: ResourceNames is a list of resource instance names that the policy matches. Using this field requires Resources to be specified. An empty list implies that every instance of the resource is matched.

resources.description:
Resources is a list of resources this rule applies to.

For example: 'pods' matches pods. 'pods/log' matches the log subresource of pods. '*' matches all resources and their subresources. 'pods/*' matches all subresources of pods. '*/scale' matches all scale subresources.

If wildcard is present, the validation rule will ensure resources do not overlap with each other.

An empty list implies all resources and subresources in this API groups apply.
